titles.title: Wire Clarification Act of 2011
To amend title 18, United States Code, to clarify the scope of the provision commonly referred to as the "Wire Act", and for other purposes.
Wire Clarification Act of 2011

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.

bill.summary: Wire Clarification Act of 2011 - Amends the federal criminal code to provide that criminal penalties under such code and other provisions of federal law for transmitting bets and wages on sporting events or contests shall not apply to any bet or wager that is permissible under the Interstate Horseracing Act of 1978.
